title: Nargesi Esfenaj - Spinach with Eggs
directions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, saute onion till golden brown, add garlic, turmeric and saute for another 5 minutes.
Add spinach, season to taste with salt and pepper. Cook for 5-7 minutes on medium heat.
Break the eggs one at a time into a small bowl and then gently place it on top of the vegetables.
Cover and cook for few minutes until the eggs are set.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
Oil for frying (I used olive oil)
